name: "1-bit Boy" and the Abandoned Castle
description:
Welcome to the Abandoned Castle! You play as "1-bit Boy". Your goal is to discover the secrets of Castle Blackthorne, long ago abandoned. Equipped with classic Platformer mechanics and a plucky attitude. Who knows what might await you...

Controls: 

Movement:  Left and Right Arrow Keys, or "A" and "D" Keys

Jump: Up Arrow Key or Space Bar

Shoot: "G" Key
